name: Home Royale
description:
Remember those crazy home remodel couples with insane budgets?  Instead of paying someone else to do the work, they spend their budget on personal arsenal upgrades and fight over control of a key, whoever escorts the key to their goal first gets the home of their dreams, or at least that was the idea.

Credits:
